title: Ottsuls Shepherd-Hooks Adjustable for Bird-Feeder Lantern Plant-Hook Garden-Stake - Plant Stand Hanger for Outdoor Flower Basket, Bird Feeder Hanger Weddings Decor
descriptions:
Ottsuls Shepherd Hooks — easy, sturdy hooks for your garden.

What it is:
- A strong metal hook on a stake you push into the ground.
- Use it to hang bird feeders, plants, lanterns, and more.

Why you’ll like it:
- Very stable: 5-prong base holds tight so it won’t tip easily.
- Strong and long-lasting: heavy steel with a smooth black, rust-free coating.
- Easy to set up: pieces screw together by hand. No special tools needed.
- Adjustable height: choose the height that works for you.
- Easy to store: take it apart in minutes when not in use.

What you can hang:
- Bird feeders and hummingbird feeders
- Flower baskets and coco-fiber moss baskets
- Solar lights, string lights, and garden lights
- Lanterns, wind chimes, and ornaments
- Mason jars, candle holders, and flower jars
- Even small birdbaths or light décor for holidays and weddings

Simple setup:
1) Screw the pole pieces together.
2) Attach the 5-prong base.
3) Press the base into the soil using your foot for gentle pressure.
4) Hang your item on the hook.

Good to know:
- Stays firm in wind thanks to the upgraded base.
- Coating helps prevent rust, so it looks nice for years.
- If you have any problems, Ottsuls Store customer support will help.

In short:
Easy to assemble, hard to tip over, and useful for many garden items. A safe, reliable hook to make your yard more beautiful.
